name: Prithvi
description: Prithvi is a Google Chrome extension that performs a very simple task that has far reaching consequences. It shows you a list of sustainable options for what you just googled. Prithvi is designed to give you the best eco-friendly results for all your product searches. It makes finding numerous eco-friendly alternatives much easier and faster. Our team aims to help you make your life greener and make the planet healthier, with just one extra click.
